errors.h File Reference

Functions and macros for tracing and error reporting. More...

Defines

#define DEBUG(y, z)   printf("%s %d %s | %s : %d###\n",__FILE__,__LINE__,__func__,y,(unsigned int)z)
 Prints the source filename, line number, function name, a string and an integer.
#define DEBUGX(y, z)   printf("%s %d %s | %s : %X###\n",__FILE__,__LINE__,__func__,y,(unsigned int)z)
 Same as DEBUG but in hexadecimal.
#define Error(n)   Error_function(n, __FILE__,__LINE__,__func__)
 Report a run-time error: It will print to standard output some information about the calling function, and then:

  • If the error code is 0, just do a red screen flash and resume.

Detailed Description

Functions and macros for tracing and error reporting.

Prints the source filename, line number, function name, a string and an integer.

Referenced by Init_program(), Load_PCX(), Render_text_SFont(), Save_background(), Set_mode_SDL(), and Set_video_mode().

#define DEBUGX ( y,
z   )     printf("%s %d %s | %s : %X###\n",__FILE__,__LINE__,__func__,y,(unsigned int)z)

Same as DEBUG but in hexadecimal.

#define Error ( n   )     Error_function(n, __FILE__,__LINE__,__func__)

Report a run-time error: It will print to standard output some information about the calling function, and then:

  • If the error code is 0, just do a red screen flash and resume.

  • If the error code is non-zero, abort the program.

Referenced by Analyze_command_line(), Button_Autosave(), Button_Load_or_Save(), Button_Resolution(), Button_Text(), Capture_brush_with_lasso(), Create_new_page(), Distort_brush(), Init_program(), Load_image(), Nibble_brush(), Outline_brush(), Program_shutdown(), Realloc_brush(), Rotate_90_deg(), Rotate_brush(), Save_background(), Save_image(), Save_picture(), Settings_load_config(), Settings_save_config(), Store_brush(), Stretch_brush(), and Window_set_shortcut().
